name: Real Texas Chili
author: AICIRTAP
summary: This chili contains no onions, beans or tomatoes. It is even better the next day. Season to your tastes as it may be too spicy for you. You can also add pinto beans, sour cream and lime juice, if desired.
ingredients: 3 pounds boneless beef chuck roast - cut into 1 inch cubes
directions: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium high heat
Saute the beef cubes in the oil for 2 minutes
Reduce heat to medium and stir in the garlic
In a small bowl, combine the chili powder, cumin and flour
Sprinkle over the meat and stir until evenly coated
Crumble the oregano over the meat and pour in 1 1/2 cans of the broth
Add the salt and ground black pepper, stir together well, bring to a boil, reduce heat to low and let simmer, partially covered for about 90 minutes
Pour in remaining broth and simmer 30 minutes more, until meat begins to fall apart
Cool, cover and refrigerate to allow the flavors to blend
